title: 24hr limit RP - Have been waiting for 2 days
body: Hey, I have been trying to purchase RP for the last 48+ hours (patiently) but I keep on getting that error message. Its been over 24hrs and I dont understand why im still waiting, please look into this problem.

replies.body: Waiting two days for that is really odd, and we'd like to take a closer look with you directly.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will check this out with you.
